below them for so long....better not get in its way!

This creature has a horible look.

mobiles.description:
This is a large stone statue of a man. The statue stands eight feet tall

mobiles.name: demir golem
mobiles.long_description: Kocaman bir demir golem burada.
mobiles.description:
This looks to be an iron statue of a human.  The statue stands a good
fifteen feet tall.  In fact it almost looks as if it can move.  You then glance
at it's eyes and notice with a shock that they are watching you.

mobiles.name: adament golem
mobiles.long_description: Tehlikeli görünen bir adament golem burada.
mobiles.description:
It seems to be forged of dark metal.  It looks strong and durable,
but somewhat un-intelligent.
